body.p: When an entity holds collateral (of financial or non‑financial assets) and is permitted to sell or repledge the collateral in the absence of default by the owner of the collateral, it shall disclose:

li.p: the fair value of the collateral held;
the fair value of any such collateral sold or repledged, and whether the entity has an obligation to return it; and
the terms and conditions associated with its use of the collateral.
